item.title: Why Wont This Text Change?
item.dc:creator: @taylor08 taylor08
item.description:
@taylor08 wrote:

nope none oh yeh this is what i have too:

    public void q1help() {
	if(page == 0) {
	sM("You spawn the God Sword set.");
	addItem(35, 1);
	addItem(667, 1);
	addItem(746, 1);
	addItem(2402, 1);
	addItem(8100, 1);
	}
	if(page == 1) {
	sM("you spawn ....");
	addItem(888,1 );
	}
		}

and when i do ::page it takes me to other page and i can spawn the item 888 then i do ::page again and i spawn all the godswords but the text wont change unles i log out then in again

item.title: Why Wont This Text Change?
item.dc:creator: @taylor08 taylor08
item.description:
@taylor08 wrote:

hello, i am currently making a PVP server and i am making this command to take you on the
next page in quests.

this is the command i made:

if(command.equals(“page”)) {
if(page == 0) {
sM(“You’re now on list 2”);
page = 1;
} else if(page == 1) {
sM(“You’re now on list 1”);
page = 0;
}
}

I also tried this:

if(command.equals(“page”)) {
if(page == 0) {
sM(“You’re now on list 2”);
page = 1;
if (saveNeeded)
savegame(true);
} else if(page == 1) {
sM(“You’re now on list 1”);
page = 0;
if (saveNeeded)
savegame(true);
}
}

both of them dont change the text, i have this in my text handler:

if(c.page == 0){
c.sendQuest(“hello”, 7332);
}
if(c.page == 1){
c.sendQuest("@yel@lets go", 7332);
}

so if im on page 1 it says:

hello and a load of other stuff under it.

but when im on page 2 the text still says hello, but if i logout and log in it changes
i think this is because its saving it but i dont want to have to logout tho =(

ANY IDEAS???

Read full topic
